titles.title: Whistleblower Act of 2019
Whistleblower Act of 2019
A bill to amend section 4712 of title 41, United States Code, to clarify the inclusion of subcontractors and subgrantees for whistleblower protection.

bill.summary:
Whistleblower Act of 2019
This bill includes subcontractors and subgrantees within the scope of provisions providing for whistleblower protection.
